title: 255. Ten Ideas to Make Politics Less Rotten
description: We Americans may love our democracy -- at least in theory -- but at the moment our feelings toward the federal government lie somewhere between disdain and hatred. Which electoral and political ideas should be killed off to make way for a saner system?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
